title: 5.22 Release Review
body:
Wtf is with these new items. Honestly, I enjoyed reading through them and was really excited for the update. Until, half of one of these new items was all that was required to 3 shot someone in this game.
Rito, you messed up. Fix it pls!

replies.body: I think Riot's going to fix your name before any of these marksman buffs.
